item.title: Recursive Argo Page Crawlers
item.description: Recently, I’ve been doing some work in kubernetes using Argo Workflows. Argo is a hyper powerful tool for running complex jobs, and allows you to run easily parallelized and templated code. One great use case for Argo are for running jobs of unknown length to parallelize data uploads and transformations. Unfortunately very little documentation / examples exist in order to help you do that, so I figured I’d share that here in case there’s anyone grepping around the internet like I was.
